__e: The fiberglass could've lodged in the wound any time after the shooting.
Apparently, it's full of some sort of weird Chinese fiberglass.
Everything here, bullshit car, bullshit house, bullshit fiberglass bow, bullshit heads on a wall, it's all bullshit.

I know that this costs five or six times more than the new RCF, and I know it's full of carbon fibre and all sorts of clever engineering that you can't reasonably expect to find further down the fiscal food chain,
I know it's carbon fibre, which is a little bit... ~ We can gloss over that.
Just like the one you sent your brother, but this one's got a carbon-fiber ply in between the wood.
And what do you do when every fibre of your being wants to say something, but you know you can't.
I want you with every fiber of my being but it isn't fair to you, it isn't fair to anyone.
Father, I have been over this and over this a thousand times, and I am certain with every fiber in my body that I couldn't have done anything differently.
Why do you think it's hitting such a nerve?
I seem to be going crazy and you're going mad... ever since I have touched your heartstrings
The deepest note of my heartstrings sounds now as it will to my dying day
I'm trying to touch a nerve, so he thinks there's a future for him with his wife and kids.
When I sent for you, I thought I was getting somebody made of the same tough fiber as your father.
Every part of him, every fiber he's got, wants to die... or find a way to bring Sam back.
